issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: Now that Android supports Attributed strings, it would be nice to allow the "link" event to be catched as in iOS, if some parts of the string has an attribute of Ti.UI.ATTRIBUTE_LINK (and can't be spotted by the autoLink property, i.e.. #hastag or @user).
fields.summary: Android: Handle links from Attributed String
